tool_description: Discover the Strain Info API – your gateway to comprehensive cannabis strain data. Access strain names, types (indica, sativa, hybrid), ratings, effects, flavors, and descriptions with ease. Build cannabis-related apps, conduct strain research, or satisfy your curiosity with accurate and up-to-date information. Enhance your projects by leveraging our API for streamlined cannabis insights. Explore the diverse world of cannabis strains today!
name: The Cannabis API
title: The Cannabis API

api_list.name: Get All Effects
api_list.description: Get Every Cannabis Effect in the dataset.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://the-cannabis-api.p.rapidapi.com/strains/getAllEffects"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-cannabis-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

url = "https://the-cannabis-api.p.rapidapi.com/strains/getAllEffects"

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Strain Flavours By ID
api_list.description: Returns the flavours of the strain with the specified ID.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://the-cannabis-api.p.rapidapi.com/strains/getFlavorsByStrainId/646bedbcde629756c60a085a"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-cannabis-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://the-cannabis-api.p.rapidapi.com/strains/getFlavorsByStrainId/{strainid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-cannabis-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Strain By Name
